person.persName: Richard Apperson Jr. (11th District Circuit Judge)

body.p: Married a woman named Elizabeth. Owned at least four slaves according to the 1860 US Federal Census Slave Schedule. Served as the Circuit Judge for the 11th District.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Richard Apperson (September 30, 1829-January 22, 1879),” Memorial #84886529, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=84886529 (accessed June 5, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery, not stated, p. 32; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery, not stated, p. 7.
